snippet: Yu Darvish, the Rangers’ ace, who was shut down last August with elbow inflammation, threw 14 pitches without discomfort and disputed the notion that he quit on the team last season.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Texas Rangers pitcher Yu Darvish is in good form after being sidelined last season with elbow inflammation; other college and pro baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish, the Rangers’ ace, who was shut down last August with elbow inflammation, threw 14 pitches without discomfort and disputed the notion that he quit on the team last season.

headline.print_headline: Darvish, Returning From Injury, Looks Sharp
headline.main: Yu Darvish, Returning From Injury, Looks Sharp
